title: Visa Ban, Impeachment Update & Syria
itunes:title: Visa Ban, Impeachment Update & Syria
description:
Kevin spoke with Antjuan Seawright, Democratic Strategist, Founder and CEO of Blueprint Strategy and Former Senior Advisor to Hillary Clinton in SC and Garrett Ventry, former spokesman for Senator Chuck Grassley and the Senate Judiciary Committee. 

They discussed Donald Trump's impeachment probe, Syria, anti-discrimination laws, comments from Fed Chair Jerome Powell, and visa bans on Chinese officials.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
